PROGRAM main
  IMPLICIT NONE
  INTEGER :: N, i, j, temp1, temp2, ans2 = 0
  INTEGER(KIND=8) :: M
  INTEGER(KIND=8), ALLOCATABLE :: H(:)
  LOGICAL, ALLOCATABLE :: ans(:)

  READ(*,*) N
  READ(*,*) M
  ALLOCATE(H(N), ans(N)) DO i = 1, N
     READ(*,*) H(i)
     ans(i) = .TRUE. END DO

  DO j = 1, M
     READ(*,*) temp1, temp2 IF (H(temp1) < H(temp2)) THEN
        ans(temp1) = .FALSE. ELSE
children.label: code_analysis

children.text:
IF (H(temp1) > H(temp2)) THEN
        ans(temp2) = .FALSE.
     ELSE
        ans(temp1) = .FALSE.
        ans(temp2) = .FALSE. END IF
  END DO

  ans2 = 0
  DO i = 1, N
     IF (ans(i)) ans2 = ans2 + 1
  END DO

  PRINT*, ans2

  DEALLOCATE(H, ans)

END PROGRAM main

PROGRAM main
  IMPLICIT NONE
  INTEGER :: N, i, j, temp1, temp2, ans2 = 0
  INTEGER(KIND=8) :: M
  INTEGER(KIND=8), ALLOCATABLE :: H(:)
  LOGICAL, ALLOCATABLE :: ans(:)

  READ(*,*) N
  READ(*,*) M
  ALLOCATE(H(N), ans(N))
  
  DO i = 1, N
     READ(*,*) H(i)
     ans(i) = .TRUE.
  END DO

  DO j = 1, M
     READ(*,*) temp1, temp2
     IF (H(temp1) < H(temp2)) THEN
        ans(temp1) = .FALSE.
     ELSE IF (H(temp1) > H(temp2)) THEN
        ans(temp2) = .FALSE.
     ELSE
        ans(temp1) = .FALSE.
        ans(temp2) = .FALSE.
     END IF
  END DO

  ans2 = 0
  DO i = 1, N
     IF (ans(i)) ans2 = ans2 + 1
  END DO

  PRINT*, ans2

  DEALLOCATE(H, ans)

END PROGRAM main
